translation: Then, Arjuna (son of Pritha) saw there (in the armies) stationed fathers, grandfathers, teachers, maternal uncles, brothers, sons, grandsons, and friends.
commentary: 1.26 There there? Did he see saw? stationed stationed? Partha: Partha? Pitrin fathers? And also? grandfathersgrandfathers? teachers teachers? maternal uncles? brothers brothers? sons sons? Grandsons grandsons? Sakhiin friends? and too.No Commentary.
